rows.label: tlk4532019301_msg0001
rows.name:
This was the main battlefield of
the great war 500 years ago.

rows.label: tlk4532019301_msg0002
rows.name:
The scars of the conflict back then
are still plain to see in the terrain.

rows.label: tlk4532019301_msg0003
rows.name:
I got shivers down my spine when I saw
a crater they call the Holy Grail Hammer.
The power of the Holy Grail is a scary thing.
